FAQ

Why multiple files instead of one?

Keyboard templates have been separated into individual files to stay within the 2GB active memory limit.

 

What does a keycap size of 1u mean?

Keycaps are based off a 1u size of 19.05mm, center-to-center, of two adjacent keys.

 

If you enjoy using Keeybs, you can buy me a coffee.
